```{r}
Age <- rep(c(6:80), 4)
Sex_NN <- c(rep(1, 150), rep(0, 150))
Section_NN <- c(rep(1, 75), 
             rep(0, 75), rep(1, 75), rep(0, 75)) 
testGAM <- data.frame( Age , Sex_NN, Section_NN)
```


```{r}
boot_gam<- function (data, testdata){
  index = sample( seq_len ( nrow ( data) ), size = nrow( data ) ) 
  train = data[index , ]
  model <- train( Actual_Time ~ Age + Section_NN + Sex_NN,
                  data = train,
                  method = "gam",
                  trace = FALSE)
  
  predictions <- predict( model, testdata )

  prediction_data <- cbind(testdata, predictions)  

  index <- 1
  time_FR_NN <- c(); time_FI_NN <- c()
  time_MR_NN <- c(); time_MI_NN <- c()
  female <- prediction_data %>% filter(Sex_NN == 0) 
  male <- prediction_data %>% filter(Sex_NN == 1) 
  
  for (age in base_years){ #gets base times (27,30,35)
     time_FR_NN[index] <- unlist(female %>% 
                               filter(Age == age, Section_NN == 0) %>% 
                               select(predictions))
     time_FI_NN[index] <- unlist(female %>% 
                               filter(Age == age, Section_NN == 1) %>% 
                               select(predictions))
    time_MR_NN[index] <- unlist(male %>% 
                               filter(Age == age, Section_NN == 0) %>% 
                               select(predictions))
    time_MI_NN[index] <- unlist(male %>% 
                               filter(Age == age, Section_NN == 1) %>% 
                               select(predictions))
    
    index <- index + 1
  }
  
FR_time <- unlist(female %>% filter(Section_NN == 0) %>% 
               select(predictions)) # times for females all ages 
FI_time <- unlist(female %>% filter(Section_NN == 1) %>% 
               select(predictions))
MR_time <- unlist(male %>% filter(Section_NN == 0) %>% 
               select(predictions))
MI_time <- unlist(male %>% filter(Section_NN == 1) %>% 
               select(predictions))

#factor27_F_NN = femaleNN/time_F_NN[1] #;
#factor27_M_NN = maleNN/time_M_NN[1] 
out$factor30_FR = FR_time/time_FR_NN[2]
out$factor30_FI = FI_time/time_FI_NN[2]
out$factor30_MR = MR_time/time_MR_NN[2]
out$factor30_MI = MI_time/time_MI_NN[2]#times divided by time at age 30 
#factor35_F = female/time_F[3] ; factor30_F = male/time_F[3]

  return( out )
}
```

##Bootstrap and tidy output 
```{r}
out <- list()
out <- do(10)* boot_gam(data = ds_NN, 
                        testdata = testGAM) 

factors30_GAM <- lapply(out, function(x){  
  as.data.frame(sapply(x,rbind))
  })
```


##Summarize the 1,000 /(10) bootstrap factors for each age 
```{r}
factors30_CI_GAM<- lapply(factors30_GAM, function(x){
  apply(x, 1, function(x){
    c(Mean = mean(x), lb = quantile(x, .05), ub = quantile(x, .95))
    })
})
factors30_CI_GAM<- lapply(factors30_CI_GAM, function(x){t(x)})

### make 4 dataframes 
df30_FR_gam <- data.frame("Age" = Age75, 
                      "Mean" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_FR[,1],
                      "lb" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_FR[,2],
                      "ub" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_FR[,3], 
                      "Sex" = "Female", "Section" = "Runner")
df30_FI_gam <- data.frame("Age" = Age75, 
                      "Mean" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_FI[,1],
                      "lb" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_FI[,2],
                      "ub" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_FI[,3],
                      "Sex" = "Female", "Section" = "Invitational")
df30_MR_gam <- data.frame("Age" = Age75,
                      "Mean" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_MR[,1],
                      "lb" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_MR[,2],
                      "ub" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_MR[,3],
                      "Sex" = "Male", "Section" = "Runner")
df30_MI_gam <- data.frame("Age" = Age75,
                      "Mean" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_MI[,1],
                      "lb" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_MI[,2],
                      "ub" = factors30_CI_GAM$factor30_MI[,3],
                      "Sex" = "Male", "Section" = "Invitational")

```

##Dataframe
```{r}
factors30_SexSectionGAMdf <- do.call("rbind", list(df30_FI_gam, df30_MI_gam, df30_FR_gam, df30_MR_gam ))
```


### Visuals 

```{r}
SexSectionGAM.plot <- ggplot(aes(x = Age), data = df30_FI_gam) +
  geom_point(data = df30_FR_gam, 
             aes( x = Age, y = Mean, color = "green"), size= 0.05) +
  geom_errorbar(data = df30_FR_gam, 
                aes(ymax = ub, ymin = lb), color = "green") +
  geom_ribbon(data = df30_FR_gam, 
              aes( ymin = lb, ymax = ub), alpha = 0.3) +
  geom_point(data = df30_FI_gam, 
             aes( x = Age, y = Mean, color = "red"), size= 0.05) +
  geom_errorbar(data = df30_FI_gam, 
                aes(ymax = ub, ymin = lb), color = "red") +
  geom_ribbon(data = df30_FI_gam, 
              aes( ymin = lb, ymax = ub), alpha = 0.3) +
  geom_point(data = df30_MI_gam, 
             aes( x = Age, y = Mean, color = "blue"), size= 0.05) +
  geom_errorbar(data = df30_MI_gam, 
                aes(ymax = ub, ymin = lb), color = "blue") +
  geom_ribbon(data = df30_MI_gam, 
              aes( ymin = lb, ymax = ub), alpha = 0.3) +
  geom_point(data = df30_MR_gam, 
             aes( x = Age, y = Mean, color = "black"), size= 0.05) +
  geom_errorbar(data = df30_MR_gam, 
                aes(ymax = ub, ymin = lb), color = "black") +
  geom_ribbon(data = df30_MR_gam, 
              aes( ymin = lb, ymax = ub), alpha = 0.3) + 
  scale_color_manual("", 
                     labels=c("Male Runner", "Male Invitational",  "Female Runner", "Female Invitational"),
                     values = c(blue = "blue",red = "red", green = "green", black = "black")) +
  ylab("Factor (Age = 30)")+
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(6, 80), expand = c(0, 1)) +
  theme(legend.position = 'top', 
        legend.spacing.x = unit(1, 'cm'), 
        legend.key.size = unit(.2, "cm"))


```
